name: Handico-op Groove
description:
For a better experience, please download the game. Gameplay on browser may lag.

____________________________________

Tutorial :

  • You have to reproduce the movements of the ghosts
  • To do so, you have to remember either the rythm of their moves or their path
  • PINK has to remember the rythm and moves with WASD -> Follow the circles
  • BLUE has to remember the path and moves with the Arrow Keys -> Tap the right direction when the circle falls at your feet

____________________________________

Handico-op Groove is a Rythm and Memory game where you help two handicaped characters to dance ! It can be played either with a friend (each player controls a character) or alone (you choose the character you want to control).

A was made in 5 days for the Brackeys Jam 2022.2 as a team of 2.
